title: Derive the standard axioms from the Lukasiewicz axioms

blocks.name: luklem1
blocks.content: Used to rederive standard propositional axioms from Lukasiewicz'. (Contributed by NM, 23-Dec-2002.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: luklem6
blocks.content: Used to rederive standard propositional axioms from Lukasiewicz'. (Contributed by NM, 22-Dec-2002.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm luklem6(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
} = {
  luklem1(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)))
  luk-1(w0, wi(w0, w1), w1)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(wi(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))
  luklem1(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(w0, w1))))
  luklem5(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wn(w1))
  luklem1(wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(wi(wi(wn(w1), w1), w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))
  luklem2(wn(w1), wi(w0, w1), w1, w1)
  luklem4(w1, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
  luk-1(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1))
  luk-1(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
  luklem4(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1)))
}
